short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Private feedback for evaluations on intra.42.fr

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension which adds an anonymous, attuned feedback form to to 42's Intranet, allowing users to provide helpful feedback without revealing their identity.
